about_the_game:
DICED Pilot is a 2D action game containing old-school platform-based movement/jump timing challenges, physics-based surroundings, jetpacks, and weapons that can destroy everything in sight!

This game features a wide variety of levels that progressively introduce new concepts and abilities such as magnet-like maneuvering, gravity switching, new weapon and jet pack types, shields and more!

New level packs and game modes can be unlocked by earning achievements.

Key Features:

  • Over 180 levels of fun, yet challenging gameplay that constantly adds new mechanics as you progress.
  • Online leaderboards to both challenge your friends and the world.
  • High resolution ray traced graphics.
  • A range of original music tracks and a spatial stereo sound system (headphones recommended).
  • 4 different game modes, each with their own leaderboards!

Story

The Ugjayi, a race of Wtherical inter-dimensional beings, discovered ways to travel to other DICED dimensions in the year 8081 and shortly after developed the special DICED ship to maneuver efficiently through them.



DICED stands for Dimension Injected Cockpit Embedding Device, the pilot's cockpit is injected into the target dimension and held in-place by the DICED dimension ship. The ship is specifically designed to maneuver through different environments, its round edges make it easier to maneuver up a slope while the cockpit stays leveled out.



The DICED Pilot must navigate towards the exit point and collect the diamonds that are scattered throughout the level.



The Ugjayi believe that by mastering the different levels of dimensions, they gain the power to consciously manipulate reality and thus create their own dimensions causing them to evolve to higher realms. When pilots are first introduced to the lower level dimensions, they start at the rank of 'Dimension Explorer'. When a pilot has sufficient skills, he or she can reach the level of 'Dimension Manipulator' or even 'Ultimate Creator'.

name: DICED Pilot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 371 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 371 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for optional features such as the leaderboards

short_description: DICED Pilot is a 2D action game containing old-school platform-based movement/jump timing challenges, physics-based surroundings, jetpacks, and weapons that can destroy everything in sight!
